Description:Welcome to Kirata - hidden in the Himalayas country with a rich tradition, the world is threatened by a despotic ruler. Your hero, Ajay Gail came here to fulfill the last wish of his mother, but he was embroiled in a civil war: the locals are trying to overthrow the pretender Pagan Mina. Embark on a journey through the open world, but beware: in a foreign country you anything can happen.Features:Kirata fauna is diverse: It is home to leopards, rhinos, eagles and even oviphages rather rare badgers - honey badger. Hunter, remember: going after prey, looking at the two, otherwise he will become a victim of ...
Mark enemy positions during the flight to improved giroplane, and if you notice, try to escape with the help of costume-wing. Embark on a journey riding on a huge elephant, the type of which even experienced soldier zatryasutsya hock!
Choose a suitable weapon! No matter how difficult the task may seem: due to the large arsenal of weapons you can get out of any situation..Features Repack:Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Do not cut | Do not recoded
